<title level="1" right="Rules">[Necromancy](/Rules.aspx?ID=268)</title>

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 298 <sup>4.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
[Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117) spells harness the power of life and death. They can sap life essence or sustain creatures with life-saving healing. Necromancy spells often have the [curse](/Traits.aspx?ID=38), [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40), [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), [negative](/Traits.aspx?ID=118), or [positive](/Traits.aspx?ID=128) traits.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
